specializations.name: Get the tools you need for innovative problem solving with this two-year research-based master’s pro
specializations.details: Get the tools you need for innovative problem solving with this two-year research-based master’s program. Through supervised research projects you’ll gain hands-on experience and tackle real-world challenges across specializations including Nanotechnology, Biochemical and Biomedical Engineering, Polymer Science and Engineering, and more.

specializations.name: The Master of Engineering program is coursework-based and will help you acquire a deeper understandi
specializations.details: The Master of Engineering program is coursework-based and will help you acquire a deeper understanding of chemical engineering fundamentals and specialties you need to advance your career. It is a self-funded program and doesn’t require a supervisor and allows you to choose your own direction or take a set of predetermined courses to get a specialization. Specialization options include Biological Engineering, Polymer Science and Engineering, Process Systems Engineering, or Entrepreneurship.

specializations.name: Choose your path of nimble generalist or get in-depth knowledge with one of four specializations.
specializations.details: Choose your path of nimble generalist or get in-depth knowledge with one of four specializations.

specializations.name: The Master of Engineering program is coursework-based and will help you acquire a deeper understandi

It is a self-funded program and doesn’t require a supervisor and allows you to choose your own direction or take a set of predetermined courses to get a specialization. Specialization options include Biological Engineering, Polymer Science and Engineering, Process Systems Engineering, or Entrepreneurship.

specializations.name: The Master of Engineering Co-Op program is coursework-based. It will help you acquire a deeper under
specializations.details: The Master of Engineering Co-Op program is coursework-based. It will help you acquire a deeper understanding of chemical engineering fundamentals and specialties while providing you with the real-world hands-on experience you need to advance your career and give you a competitive edge in the job market. It is a self-funded program and doesn’t require a supervisor. It allows you to choose your own direction or take a set of predetermined courses to get a specialization. Specialization options include Biological Engineering, Polymer Science and Engineering, Process Systems Engineering, or Entrepreneurship.

specializations.name: The Master of Engineering Co-Op program is coursework-based. It will help you acquire a deeper under
specializations.details: The Master of Engineering Co-Op program is coursework-based. It will help you acquire a deeper understanding of chemical engineering fundamentals and specialties while providing you with the real-world hands-on experience you need to advance your career and give you a competitive edge in the job market. It is a self-funded program and doesn’t require a supervisor. It allows you to choose your own direction or take a set of predetermined courses to get a specialization. Specialization options include Biological Engineering, Polymer Science and Engineering, Process Systems Engineering, or Entrepreneurship.

specializations.name: The Master of Engineering (MEng) in Civil Engineering is a coursework-based degree option, which may
specializations.details: The Master of Engineering (MEng) in Civil Engineering is a coursework-based degree option, which may be completed on a part-time or full-time basis. If you are registered full-time, you can normally complete the degree in three to four terms. This is a self-funded degree option; therefore, you will not be provided with funding or be assigned a supervisor.
